profiles.views

Views for the profiles application.

This module defines the views used in the profiles application, including index and profile views.

Functions

index(request)

Display the list of profiles.

profile(request, username)

Display a profile.
profiles.views.index(request)

Display the list of profiles.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered HTML response.

Return type:

HttpResponse

profiles.views.profile(request, username)

Display a profile.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • username (str) – The username of the profile to display.

Returns:

The rendered HTML response.

Return type:

HttpResponse
